metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38150 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Varnish Cache 7.0.0, 7.0.1, 7.0.2, and 7.1.0, it is possible to cause the Varnish Server to assert and automatically restart through forged HTTP/1 backend responses. An attack uses a crafted reason phrase of the backend response status line. This is fixed in 7.0.3 and 7.1.1.

criterions.comment: varnish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
